#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
  {
  	int t,i,r;
  	cin>>t;
  	cout<<endl;
  	for(i=0;i<t;i++)
  	 {
  	 	long int n,j,p,sum,w;
  	 	cin>>n;
  	 	for(j=1;j<=n;j++)
  	 	 { sum=0;
  	 	 	p=j;
  	 	 	while(p!=0)
  	 	 	 {
  	 	 	   r=p%10;
				   p/=10;
				   sum+=r;	
				 }if(sum+j==n)
				{  w=j;	
				  break;}
			}if(j==n+1)
			cout<<"NONE"<<endl;
			else
			cout<<w<<endl;
			
		
	   }
  }
